name: A game only made with text
name_original: A game only made with text
description:
This is a game which doesn't focus on  fancy graphics, animations, music or polish, but on gameplay instead. It is most fun to play with some friends and try to find out the solution together.

Devlog on youtube:

How to play
  • At the top, you can see the clue for each level. With that you have to figure out how to decipher the text below it.
  • Enter the deciphered text in the box and click on confirm.
  • The sentence you decipher will be the clue for the next level
